rows.label: qev091305_MSG0001
rows.name: That explains it...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0002
rows.name: The Ganglion have been digging them up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0003
rows.name:
And here I thought a hundred-meter worm
was forcing them up as it burrowed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0004
rows.name: I'm almost disappointed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0006
rows.name: Riiight...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0007
rows.name:
Sorry, what were we talking about? Oh, right.
The Ganglion. So what should we do about them?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_JNK0040
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: qev091305_SEL0041
rows.name:
Propose that you take out the Ganglion forces who are
responsible for disturbing the data probes.

rows.label: qev091305_JNK0050
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev091305_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Phog what he wants to do.

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0008
rows.name: I suppose there's no way around it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0009
rows.name: If we stop them, we stop the damage to our probes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0010
rows.name: I'm not a fan of combat, but I'll do my best.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0011
rows.name: Well, if I'm being honest...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0012
rows.name: I'd like to turn around and go home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0013
rows.name: Yeah...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0014
rows.name: I suppose that's not really a solution, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0015
rows.name:
If we let them go, the damage will spread,
and who knows when we'll find them again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0016
rows.name: Let's do it. Together, we should almost definitely be okay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0017
rows.name: Are you hurt?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0018
rows.name:
I'm okay—just tired, mostly.
It's been ages since I fought like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0019
rows.name: Still, I'm glad it's over.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0020
rows.name: And you made it possible, so...thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0021
rows.name:
It was reassuring having you along, you know?
Almost like being by my brother's side again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0022
rows.name: Maybe even better, in a way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0023
rows.name:
It's actually kind of odd
to feel this comfortable with a stranger.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_JNK0010
rows.name: Offer

rows.label: qev091305_SEL0011
rows.name:
Tell Phog that you want to take on
more missions together.

rows.label: qev091305_JNK0020
rows.name: Praise

rows.label: qev091305_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Phog that he showed great courage.

rows.label: qev091305_JNK0030
rows.name: Correct

rows.label: qev091305_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Phog not to get too comfortable.

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0024
rows.name: That's...very kind of you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0025
rows.name: It's been ages since anyone counted on me for anything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0026
rows.name:
Pretty sure the last time was when I was 21
and Frye had me buy his Scotch...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0027
rows.name: Oh, um, thank you. People don't usually...praise me like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0028
rows.name:
I think the last time was when I scored
the game-winning touchdown. I was 15.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0029
rows.name: ...Yeeeah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0030
rows.name:
So, um...would you maybe want to do this again?
I mean, if you feel like it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0031
rows.name: What?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0032
rows.name: Oh, gosh. Sorry. I guess I was just—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0033
rows.name: Yeaaaah...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0034
rows.name: Er, so this may be stupid after what you just said, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0035
rows.name: I hope we can do this again sometime.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0036
rows.name: I'm always on my own, so I can join you most any time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091305_MSG0038
rows.name: Until our next mission, then.[ST:wait ]
